sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function Form() { const [formdata, setformdata] = useState({ firstname: "", lastname: "", email:"", comment:"", isfriend:true, sex:"", favcol:"", }); console.log(formdata.favcol) function handleSUB(event) { const {name,value,type,checked}=event.target setformdata((prevdata) => ({ ...prevdata, [name]: type==="checked"? checked : value, })); } return (
